posts.postText:
Hey guys,



So I was thinking to myself and played some servers, to gather some ideas which are usally used at games:


-New Models (HL2 + Your own funny models)
-New Trails (Get a text edit trail)
-New Misc (3rd Person Mod, Slot Saved for VIPs, etc.)


Feel Free to Make Posts!
Meh, I think that third person would be a waste of time.  And saved slots for vip's will just make the capacitly of the server smaller, by a substancial amount.
More guns depending on what status you are and how many productive posts you've had should be available too.

>> More guns depending on what status you are and how many productive posts you've had should be available too.â€‰

That would lead to people shitposting.
